articles.title: Petrol to hit new record this week, fuelling inflation - News24
articles.description: South Africa’s fuel prices are set to rise to a record on Wednesday, adding to inflationary pressures in an economy that imports almost all of its fuel.

articles.author: Nicole McCain
articles.title: Covid-19: 106 new cases and two deaths reported in SA - News24
articles.description: According to the National Institute for Communicable Diseases, South Africa has recorded 106 new Covid-19 cases and two more deaths. To date, 15 236 753 people are fully vaccinated.
articles.content:
• South Africa has recorded 106 new Covid-19 cases.
  • Two more deaths were also recorded, increasing the death toll to 89 179.
  • Gauteng accounted for 21% of the new cases.
